title: Not Without Attitude
itunes:title: Not Without Attitude
description:
There are so many video games! Games that we played and talk about herein, including Mario + Rabbids: Sparks of Hope, Scorn, Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed, A Plague Tale: Requiem, and more Grounded. Also, the closure of G4, the disappearance (maybe?) of performance modes, the Bayonetta 3 voiceover kerfuffle, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:00:59) All the Apple Cider
(00:02:48) Show rundown
(00:04:07) Alex's Gaming Dreams
(00:12:33) Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope [Nintendo Switch] on Oct 20, 2022
(00:34:39) First Break
(00:34:44) Scorn [Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Oct 14, 2022
(00:44:50) Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed [Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Oct 18, 2022
(01:00:44) A Plague Tale: Requiem [Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Oct 18, 2022
(01:05:30) Grounded [Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC] on Sep 27, 2022
(01:13:50) The Excavation of Hob's Barrow [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Sep 28, 2022
(01:15:37) Kids wearing logo shirts but not knowing the source material
(01:18:39) Second Break
(01:18:43) News
(01:19:27) G4 shutting down
(01:26:56) Gotham Knights capped to 30FPS across consoles
(01:33:39) Bayonetta voice acting dispute
(01:50:14) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:52:11) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(01:54:02) Nextlander updates
(01:54:43) See Ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
